featured.text: Its worldwide popularity is mainly due to its theme music, which showcases ABBA’s timeless songs in a fresh and vital way 24 retains the essence of both pop music and good musical theater.

definition.zh_def: 永恆的；不受時間影響的
definition.en_def: Not affected by the passage of time or changes in fashion.
definition.example: Her timeless beauty captivated everyone in the room.
